mapper.select: SELECT distinct a.postNum, a.title, b.nickname, a.content, a.postTime, a.solYN, a.delYN, a.view, a.subjectID, c.subjectNo FROM post as a join student as b on a.email = b.email join subject as c on substr(c.subjectID, 6, 7) = a.subjectID where a.delYN = 0 order by postNum desc

SELECT distinct a.postNum, a.title, b.nickname, a.content, a.postTime, a.solYN, a.delYN, a.view, a.subjectID, c.subjectNo FROM post as a join student as b on a.email = b.email join subject as c on substr(c.subjectID, 6, 7) = a.subjectID where a.delYN = 0 and a.solYN = 0 order by postNum desc

SELECT distinct a.postNum, a.title, b.nickname, a.content, a.postTime, a.solYN, a.delYN, a.view, a.subjectID, c.subjectNo FROM post as a join student as b on a.email = b.email join subject as c on substr(c.subjectID, 6, 7) = a.subjectID where a.delYN = 0 and c.subjectNo = #{searchKey} order by postNum desc

SELECT DISTINCT a.postNum, a.title, b.nickname, a.content, a.postTime, a.solYN, a.delYN, a.view, a.replyNum, a.subjectID, c.subjectNo FROM post AS a JOIN student AS b ON a.email = b.email JOIN subject AS c ON c.code = a.subjectID where a.postNum=#{postNum}
SELECT distinct subjectNO FROM subject where code=#{code}
INSERT INTO reply (postNum,email,content,replyTime,accusedYN) VALUES(#{postNum},#{email},#{content},NOW(),0); UPDATE post SET replyNum = replyNum+1 where postNum=#{postNum};
